title: Head Towards the Goal!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Let’s see~, I think it’s this way....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honoka-chan, where are you trying to take us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>There’s this specialty store that Karin-san told me about! There were so many cute clothes there, and they were all so cheap!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ah, Karin took me there once before too. Do you remember the place, Honoka? I want to go there too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Now I’m curious why you two want to go there so much.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe. I’m sure both Kotori-chan and you will love it, Riko-chan~! Ah, I remember now! We need to turn here! Let’s go~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>I think I recognize this area too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah, wait, you two! There’s no need to run....!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Let’s go after them, Kotori-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>We came here to shop, not to practice running~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
